docs.snippet: Bahrain announced on Thursday that it has restored the power of its domestic spy service to make some arrests, reversing a key reform recommended in the wake of the crackdown that followed the country's 2011 Arab Spring protests....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bahrain announced on Thursday that it has restored the power of its domestic spy service to make some arrests, reversing a key reform recommended in the wake of the crackdown that followed the country's 2011 Arab Spring protests.

headline.main: Bahrain, Reversing Reform, Restores Arrest Powers to Spies
headline.print_headline: Bahrain, Reversing Reform, Restores Arrest Powers to Spies

docs.snippet: A pack of wolves in eastern Poland made a wrong choice of prey when it tried to attack a herd of bison, but was dismally chased away....

docs.snippet: Peace talks being prepared later this month in the Kazakh capital of Astana should aim to consolidate Syria's ceasefire and pave the way for wider U.N.-backed negotiations in February, the U.N. Special Envoy Staffan de Mistura said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Peace talks being prepared later this month in the Kazakh capital of Astana should aim to consolidate Syria's ceasefire and pave the way for wider U.N.-backed negotiations in February, the U.N. Special Envoy Staffan de Mistura said on Thursday.

headline.main: U.N. Envoy Hopes Astana Talks Will Consolidate Syria Truce

docs.snippet: Everton have signed England under-20 winger Ademola Lookman from third tier side Charlton Athletic on a four-and-a-half year deal for an undisclosed sum, the Premier League club said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Everton have signed England under-20 winger Ademola Lookman from third tier side Charlton Athletic on a four-and-a-half year deal for an undisclosed sum, the Premier League club said on Thursday.
